name: Gentoo KDE SVN Overlay
short_description: CONTINUED in Exherbo Linux. Go to exherbo.org. This public Gentoo Linux overlay provides live ebuilds enabling you to build KDE 3.x from the KDE subversion repository on Gentoo Linux. ebuilds for KDE4 are currently being prepared.
